posts.post_title: WTB 1895 N300's - Dahlen, Glasscock, Griffin, Kennedy, Kinslow, Lovett & Shindle
posts.post_content:
Paying well for the players listed above....Lowgrade is preferred, trimmed/torn cards and beaters welcome!  

I'm offering up plenty of tradebait too including a few other 19th Century cards, quite a few e107s, Cobb, Ruth, etc...


Thanks in advance!  Any help is appreciated as I'm trying to get this set completed!

Brian
